meanings.definition: A multinucleate cell resulting from the division of the nucleus without the division of the cytoplasm.
meanings.sent1: The coenocyte in the organism had many nuclei but shared the same cytoplasm.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the coenocyte to understand how it functions with multiple nuclei.
meanings.sent3: The coenocyte threw a party, and all its nuclei attended!
meanings.sent4: The coenocyte was like a bustling city with its many nuclei working together.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the coenocyte looked like a vibrant community of nuclei.
